#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int arr1[1003],arr2[1003],ans[1003];
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,k,m,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		m=0;
		memset(ans,0,sizeof(ans));
		cin>>k;
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		{
			cin>>arr1[i];
		}
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
			cin>>arr2[i];
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		{
			for(j=arr1[i];j<arr2[i];j++)
				ans[j]++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<1003;i++){
			if(ans[i]>m)
			m=ans[i];}
		cout<<m<<"\n";
	 
		memset(arr1,0,sizeof(arr1));
		memset(arr1,0,sizeof(arr2));
	}
	return 0;
}
